posts.message:
Is there a way to get the value of two <input> tag using javascript and save them as a .sql file like:
    <input type="text" id="test1">
    <input type="text" id="test2">
I need to save them on .sql file and download it as I'll take the input value and save the file with the following content :-
 INSERT INTO `table`(`col1`, `col2`) VALUES ("{The value of input1}","{value of input2}")
 
the reason of using javascript is that this script will be used only offline
PS :- I googled a lot and read topics on StackOverflow but unfortunately it didn't help

هو أنا  لو عامل desktop application using C# 
و عامله  كونكت ب  DB sql server  
اه الملفات ال محتاجها علشان اخد نسخة من البروجكت بدون ال source code  
علشان يشتغل  عند العميل  ؟

posts.message:
Me interviewing a candidate today:

"They say that Java is a write once, run anywhere language, can you tell me how is this achieved?"
..... 
"Because Java is an object oriented language, and it can adapt to any platform"
 

Moral of the story: when you do not know, say I do not know! Answering with any big words that comes to your head makes you look فتااي.

#End_of_Text
